mass_driver._note: Should also require transport skill, but only when used for transport.
mass_driver.name: Mass Driver
mass_driver.desc: A primitive method of sending stuff elsewhere. Doubles as a weapon.

cargo_drone_s.name: Cargo Drone S
cargo_drone_s.desc: A fast little craft, good for sending a constant supply of stuff cheaply.

cargo_drone_m.name: Cargo Drone M
cargo_drone_m.desc: Medium-sized craft. Transports more stuff and can tolerate some variation in workload.

cargo_drone_l.name: Cargo Drone L
cargo_drone_l.desc: Large cargo transporter. Transports a lot of stuff, quite tolerant to variation in workload.

cargo_drone_xl.name: Cargo Drone XL
cargo_drone_xl.desc: Massive cargo barge. Although slow, can move a huge amount of stuff at once.

pocket_hole.name: Pocket Hole
pocket_hole.desc: A little hole in your pocket. Seems to send things elsewhere.
